message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can you meet me there?
I can do $8000, but that's as low as I can go. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above that. Can you meet me at $7500?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I can still do a bit better. How about $8200?
I appreciate your efforts to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that. Can you meet me at $7000?
I'm not going to go any lower than $8000. That's my final offer. Take it or leave it.
